summary: BuildRequest lists no explicit requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces/changes multiple components beyond a single Apps Script file, including backend canister code and React frontend pieces, which appear outside the requested “final single-file copy-paste-ready Google Chat bot (frontend/code.gs)” scope and may conflict with the stated constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister update adding/altering greeting card and static avatar endpoints (Motoko actor with getGreetingCard/getStaticAvatar).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope centers on a single-file Google Apps Script bot implementation (frontend/code.gs) and explicitly discourages introducing/depending on additional backend services; no requirement requested backend canister changes.

hallucinated_features.description: React frontend updates for displaying an AIOPS bot avatar/instructions and adding React Query hooks and config loader for backend actor instances.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest asks for a final single-file copy‑paste‑ready Apps Script bot; no requirement requested UI/frontend React app changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded Google Apps Script bot implementation including multi-step incident creation flow, FAQ/Q&A fallback, cardsV2 UI, and script-properties based configuration.
hallucinated_features.reason: Although aligned with the title, these are still “features implemented” without any explicit requirements in the BuildRequest (Requirements: none).
